```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(shiny)
library(leaflet)
library(tidyverse)

install.packages("bigrquery")
library(bigrquery)

# Warehouse Connection
# BigQuery API Key
bq_auth(path = "keys/mpg-data-warehouse-api_key-master.json")
Sys.setenv(BIGQUERY_TEST_PROJECT = "mpg-data-warehouse")
billing <- bq_test_project()
```

```{r}
# vegetation_gridVeg_summaries
sql_surveys <- "
  SELECT
      x.year,
      x.grid_point,
      y.lat,
      y.long,
      x.survey
  FROM(SELECT * 
      FROM(SELECT 
          survey_year as year,
          survey_grid_point as grid_point,
          'bird_point_count_summaries' AS survey
      FROM `mpg-data-warehouse.bird_point_count_summaries.abundance_order`
      GROUP BY 
          survey_year, survey_grid_point
      ORDER BY 
          survey_year, survey_grid_point)
  
  #####################################################################
  UNION ALL 
  #####################################################################
  
  SELECT
      year,
      grid_point,
      'vegetation_biomass horizontal_cover_robel' AS survey
  FROM `mpg-data-warehouse.vegetation_biomass.horizontal_cover_robel`) AS x
  
  #####################################################################
  # JOIN
  #####################################################################
  
  LEFT JOIN `mpg-data-warehouse.grid_point_metadata.point_location_position` AS y
  ON x.grid_point = y.grid_point
" 
bq_surveys <- bq_project_query(billing, sql_surveys)
tb_surveys <- bq_table_download(bq_surveys)
df_surveys <- as.data.frame(tb_surveys)
```

Sidebar {.sidebar data-width=250}
=====================================
```{r}
distinct_years <- df_surveys %>%
    select(year) %>%
    distinct(year) %>%
    arrange(year)

selectInput("year_selection",
            "Select Year:",
            choices = distinct_years,
            selected = c(2017, 2013),
            multiple = TRUE)

distinct_surveys <- df_surveys %>%
  select(survey) %>%
  distinct(survey)

selectInput("survey_selection",
            "Select Survey:",
            choices = distinct_surveys,
            selected = "vegetation_biomass horizontal_cover_robel",
            multiple = TRUE)

# Show all gridpoints as shadow on top of tiles
gridpoints_all <- df_surveys %>%
  select(grid_point, lat, long) %>%
  distinct(grid_point, lat, long)

gridpoints_selected <- reactive({
  df_surveys %>%
    select(grid_point, lat, long, year, survey) %>%
    filter(year %in% input$year_selection & survey %in% input$survey_selection) %>%
    distinct(grid_point, lat, long)
})

output$map_base <- renderLeaflet({
  leaflet(options = leafletOptions(zoomControl = TRUE,
                                 minZoom = 12, maxZoom = 16)) %>%
    setView(-114.001, 46.70, zoom = 13) %>%
    addWMSTiles("https://basemap.nationalmap.gov/arcgis/rest/services/USGSImageryTopo/MapServer/tile/{z}/{y}/{x}", 
                layers = "OpenTopoMap")
  })
  
observe({
  leafletProxy("map_base") %>%
  clearMarkers() %>%
  addCircleMarkers(gridpoints_all$long, gridpoints_all$lat, 
                 color = 'x',
                 radius = 17, popup = as.character(gridpoints_all$grid_point)) %>%
  addCircleMarkers(gridpoints_selected()$long, gridpoints_selected()$lat, radius = 4, color = 'yellow',
                   popup = as.character(gridpoints_selected()$grid_point))
})
```
